opinion.opinion_text:
DISCIPLINARY CASES This cause came on for further consideration upon respondent's filing of a response to an order to show cause. Upon consideration thereof.
It is ordered that respondent shall file, within 30 days of the date of this order, an affidavit of compliance.
It is further ordered that if respondent fails to file the affidavit of compliance within 30 days of the date of this order, he shall be held in contempt of this court.
